sentence: niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattam'pi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
grammar: nt loc sg of niṭṭhitacīvara, comp
meaning: when the robe-cloth is complete; when the robe is finished

sentence: niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattam'pi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.

meaning: offence requiring confession, offence involving expiation

sentence: niṭṭhitacīvarasmiṃ bhikkhunā ubbhatasmiṃ kathine ekarattam'pi ce bhikkhu ticīvarena vippavaseyya, aññatra bhikkhusammutiyā nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pali_1: When the robe is finished by a monk, (and) when the kaṭhina privilege is withdrawn, even for one night if a monk should stay apart from the three robes, except with the agreement of monks, this is an offence requiring relinquishment and confession
